# paths()

**Instance Method**

Returns an array containing the Bezier paths that make up an annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
func paths() -> [Any]!
```

## Related Documentation

- **remove(_:)**: Removes a Bezier path from an annotation.
- **add(_:)**: Adds a Bezier path to an annotation.
